alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 12:53PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Humboldt and north central Lander Counties through 130 PM PDT... At 1253 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Valmy, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Humboldt and north central Lander Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Humboldt County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County
